section.name: Java User List
section.p: This list is for users of Java Lucene to ask questions, share knowledge, and discuss issues. Lucene developers are also expected to be lurking on this list to offer support to users of Lucene.

section.name: Java Developer List
section.p: This is the list where participating developers of the Java Lucene project meet and discuss issues, code changes/additions, etc. Do not send mail to this list with usage questions or configuration questions and problems.

section.name: Lucene4c Developer List
section.p: This is the list where participating developers of the lucene4c project meet and disucss issues related to development of lucene4c. Do not send mail to this list with usage or configuration questions and problems.

section.name: All Lucene Commits List
section.p: This is a read-only list where all code commits messages go.
